item.title: How to change character design recolor
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

unrenamed: anIntArrayArray1003
refactored: characterDesignColorArray
class: client

Original:

    static final int[][] anIntArrayArray1003 = {
        {
            6798, 107, 10283, 16, 4797, 7744, 5799, 4634, 33697, 22433, 
            2983, 54193
        }, {
            8741, 12, 64030, 43162, 7735, 8404, 1701, 38430, 24094, 10153, 
            56621, 4783, 1341, 16578, 35003, 25239
        }, {
            25238, 8742, 12, 64030, 43162, 7735, 8404, 1701, 38430, 24094, 
            10153, 56621, 4783, 1341, 16578, 35003
        }, {
            4626, 11146, 6439, 12, 4758, 10270
        }, {
            4550, 4537, 5681, 5673, 5790, 6806, 8076, 4574
        }
    };

[“0”][] = hairColor (quotes added for some bbcode fuckery)
[1][] = torsoColor
[2][] = legColor
[3][] = feetColor
[4][] = skinColor

[][0] = Original model color (do not change this unless you change the original model default color)

Will a client that does not have the recolor values crash when value is requested?

  • No

Example: (adding the skin color 1337)

replace:

{
            4550, 4537, 5681, 5673, 5790, 6806, 8076, 4574
        }

with

{
            4550,1337, 4537, 5681, 5673, 5790, 6806, 8076, 4574
        }

Read full topic
item.source: How to change character design recolor
